mapper.insert: insert into board values( board_seq.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 0, #{boardClass} )
mapper.select: select board_no boardNo, board_title as boardTitle , board_content as boardContent , board_date as boardDate , board_count as boardCount , board_class as boardClass from board order by 1 desc
